\documentclass[10pt]{article}
\usepackage{pgf,tikz,pgfplots}
\pgfplotsset{compat=1.15}
\usepackage{mathrsfs}
\usetikzlibrary{arrows}
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{document}
\definecolor{rvwvcq}{rgb}{0.08235294117647059,0.396078431372549,0.7529411764705882}
\definecolor{ccqqqq}{rgb}{0.8,0,0}
\definecolor{dtsfsf}{rgb}{0.8274509803921568,0.1843137254901961,0.1843137254901961}
\definecolor{qqwwzz}{rgb}{0,0.4,0.6}
\definecolor{wrwrwr}{rgb}{0.3803921568627451,0.3803921568627451,0.3803921568627451}
\definecolor{ffffff}{rgb}{1,1,1}
\begin{tikzpicture}[line cap=round,line join=round,>=triangle 45,x=1cm,y=1cm]
\begin{axis}[
x=1cm,y=1cm,
axis lines=middle,
xmin=-9.304252011620802,
xmax=10.767616089694862,
ymin=-6.057434024715907,
ymax=7.328155936356349,
xtick={-9,-8,...,10},
ytick={-6,-5,...,7},]
\clip(-9.304252011620802,-6.057434024715907) rectangle (10.767616089694862,7.328155936356349);
\fill[line width=2pt,color=rvwvcq,fill=rvwvcq,fill opacity=0.10000000149011612] (1.806491339418093,1.0368521133894852) -- (1.6693551059885632,0.8107506115599666) -- (1.678674038022495,0.6613190549558323) -- (1.8081050936141205,0.8800958476945664) -- cycle;
\fill[line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr,fill=wrwrwr,fill opacity=0.1] (1.1600696963068984,-0.0421110500814874) -- (0.8880862060602697,0.016261128019896955) -- (0.8239828763299343,-0.29163765629427063) -- (1.0818033899854085,-0.34756900101002025) -- cycle;
\draw (-7.270997840318696,-0.8439617906079209) node[anchor=north west] {$\mathcal{M}(X)$};
\draw [line width=1.2pt] (-3.880503329011805,0.7289492470933938)-- (5.36692050776899,-1.2771783608858103);
\draw [->,line width=2pt,color=qqwwzz] (-2.341212831695544,0.3950169846741138) -- (1.8081050936141212,2.432783653870252);
\draw [line width=2pt,dash pattern=on 1pt off 1pt] (1.7922010908685861,2.424973057698777)-- (1.8081050936141208,0.8800958476945666);
\draw [line width=2pt,dash pattern=on 1pt off 1pt] (1.8081050936141208,0.8800958476945666)-- (1.0818033899854087,-0.34756900101002025);
\draw [line width=0.8pt,dash pattern=on 1pt off 1pt] (1.7922010908685861,2.424973057698777)-- (1.0818033899854087,-0.34756900101002025);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=dtsfsf] (-2.341212831695544,0.3950169846741138)-- (1.8081050936141205,0.8800958476945664);
\draw (4.224708435889368,-0.17924408075915255) node[anchor=north west] {$\mathcal{M}(X_0)$};
\draw [color=qqwwzz](1.2008945401067477,3.118277107314149) node[anchor=north west] {$\boldsymbol Y$};
\draw [line width=2.4pt,color=dtsfsf] (-2.341212831695544,0.3950169846741138)-- (1.0818033899854085,-0.34756900101002025);
\draw [color=ccqqqq](-0.45438289422253136,0.2508673785547564) node[anchor=north west] {$\hat{\boldsymbol Y}_0$};
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (-7.6330612039372765,-2.1683936804305435)-- (-4.216312144787626,-2.1683936804305435);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (-2.5998794039182505,-2.183508340490661)-- (6.74099274191554,-2.183508340490661);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (6.74099274191554,-2.183508340490661)-- (10.009227236275795,3.477239854790476);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (10.009227236275795,3.477239854790476)-- (0.4077905090311891,3.477239854790475);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (-1.224445338447586,3.4240305418128507)-- (-4.625243851973955,3.378686561632499);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (-4.625243851973955,3.378686561632499)-- (-8.403908867003253,-2.1683936804305435);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (-8.403908867003253,-2.1683936804305435)-- (-7.6330612039372765,-2.1683936804305435);
\draw [color=ccqqqq](-0.11550719900551361,1.228393422450004) node[anchor=north west] {$\hat{\boldsymbol Y}$};
\draw (1.9959490558082122,1.9452458546398521) node[anchor=north west] {$\hat{\boldsymbol \varepsilon}$};
\draw (1.161793498350938,1.580302798252293) node[anchor=north west] {$\hat{\boldsymbol \varepsilon}_0$};
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (1.806491339418093,1.0368521133894852)-- (1.6693551059885632,0.8107506115599666);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (1.6693551059885632,0.8107506115599666)-- (1.678674038022495,0.6613190549558323);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=rvwvcq] (1.678674038022495,0.6613190549558323)-- (1.8081050936141205,0.8800958476945664);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=rvwvcq] (1.8081050936141205,0.8800958476945664)-- (1.806491339418093,1.0368521133894852);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (1.1600696963068984,-0.0421110500814874)-- (0.8880862060602697,0.016261128019896955);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (0.8880862060602697,0.016261128019896955)-- (0.8239828763299343,-0.29163765629427063);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (0.8239828763299343,-0.29163765629427063)-- (1.0818033899854085,-0.34756900101002025);
\draw [line width=2pt,color=wrwrwr] (1.0818033899854085,-0.34756900101002025)-- (1.1600696963068984,-0.0421110500814874);
\begin{scriptsize}
\draw [color=ffffff] (-3.111029725951292,2.954926455947031) circle (0.5pt);
\draw[color=ffffff] (-3.0089842889354346,3.124793947606784) node {$A$};
\draw [fill=wrwrwr] (-2.341212831695544,0.3950169846741138) circle (2.5pt);
\draw[color=wrwrwr] (-2.435502343183558,0.6874956781613002) node {$O$};
\end{scriptsize}
\end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
